entry.title: Tip of the week 14
entry.summary:
Terminator : a powerful terminal for sysadmins

You dream of having a terminal that allow to open many terms in one window, launch a same update/fix on these terms with a replicate system, with a lot of keyboard shortcuts, multiple layouts/profiles, and more ? Terminator is for you !

Installation

Terminator is available in many distros (Debian, Fedora, Ubuntu, RHEL, FreeBSD, etc) , and you can install it with your favorite package installer :

natjohan# yum install terminator
or
natjohan# aptitude install terminator

That's it ! Enjoy ;-)
